NeedIt Type","secure":false,"value":[{"value":"(function execute() {
 /* Return a quoted string. For example:

 if (vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill') {
 return gs.getMessageLang("hi there {0}", vaContext.getRequesterLang(), [vaInputs.first_name]);
 } else {
 return gs.getMessageLang("how are you {0}", vaContext.getRequesterLang(), [vaInputs.last_name]);
 }
 */
 // return the display value (Label) for the needit_type choice 
 return 'You selected: ' + vaInputs.needit_type;
})()
","mode":"script"}],"requestFeedback":true,"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"e3be003c374e4863bfae4e23c7de2693":{"name":"NeedIt List","prompt":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Select a NeedIt record to view."}]}],"mode":"simple"},"confirmMessage":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"acknowledgeMsg":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"skippable":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"skipReprompt":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"defaultValue":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"variableId":"6f40b3552d1748d1ba80c1c9da046a07","detailDescription":"","id":"e3be003c374e4863bfae4e23c7de2693","stepType":"ReferenceChoicePrompt","mode":"external","script":"(function execute() {
	
	 // Initialize an array for the list of NeedIt records to show
	 var options = [];
	
	 // Query the table selected in the Table field for active records with the 
	 // u_request_type selected in the NeedIt Type node where the user is the 
	 // u_requested_for. Order the results by the When needed value.
	 var grNI = new GlideRecord('x_58872_needit_needit');
	 grNI.addQuery('u_request_type',vaInputs.needit_type.getValue());
	 grNI.addQuery('active','true');
	 grNI.addQuery('u_requested_for',vaInputs.user);
	 grNI.orderBy('u_when_needed');
	 grNI.query();
	
	 // Push a value and label pair to the array for each record the query returns.
	 // The value is the unique value. The label is the number, u_when_needed, and 		 // short_description values for the NeedIt record.
	 while(grNI.next()) {
	 options.push({ 'value': grNI.getUniqueValue(), 'label': grNI.getValue('number') + " (" + grNI.getDisplayValue('u_when_needed') + "): " + grNI.getValue('short_description') });
	 }
	
	 // Return the array
	 return options;
	
	})()","metadataScript":"","cardData":{},"isMultipleSelect":false,"noRecordsResponseMsg":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Noooooooooooooooooooo!"}]}],"mode":"simple"},"condition":{"value":"(function execute() {
	
	 // Initialize an array for the list of NeedIt records to show
	 var options = [];
	
	 // Query the table selected in the Table field for active records with the 
	 // u_request_type selected in the NeedIt Type node where the user is the 
	 // u_requested_for. Order the results by the When needed value.
	 var grNI = new GlideRecord('x_58872_needit_needit');
	 grNI.addQuery('u_request_type',vaInputs.needit_type.getValue());
	 grNI.addQuery('active','true');
	 grNI.addQuery('u_requested_for',vaInputs.user);
	 grNI.orderBy('u_when_needed');
	 grNI.query();
	
	 // Push a value and label pair to the array for each record the query returns.
	 // The value is the unique value. The label is the number, u_when_needed, and 		 // short_description values for the NeedIt record.
	 while(grNI.next()) {
	 options.push({ 'value': grNI.getUniqueValue(), 'label': grNI.getValue('number') + " (" + grNI.getDisplayValue('u_when_needed') + "): " + grNI.getValue('short_description') });
	 }
	
	 // Return the array
	 return options;
	
	})()","mode":"external_script"},"hasCardHeader":false,"cardMetadata":{"mode":"card","metadataScript":"","cardTemplate":"","cardFields":{},"cardDefinition":{}},"withNluUserInput":false,"skipIfFulfilled":false},"1b88d19fa8e944e4bd1ffb6ce387401a":{"id":"1b88d19fa8e944e4bd1ffb6ce387401a","stepType":"BooleanPrompt","name":"Search search_count","script":"(function execute() {
	 // Add 1 to the search_count variable
	 vaVars.search_count = vaVars.search_count + 1;
	})()","stepType":"ScriptAction","applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"b21876e2a8fd42f2988fe603e805f6f6":{"id":"b21876e2a8fd42f2988fe603e805f6f6","stepType":"Decision","name":"search_count value"},"2ea5387ea49444d3ba92f2166224b917":{"id":"2ea5387ea49444d3ba92f2166224b917","stepType":"TextOutput","name":"Limit Reached","secure":false,"value":[{"value":"(function execute() {
	 // If Live Chat is available, inform users they will be transfered to a live agent
	 // otherwise, let them know how to work with more NeedIt records
	 if (vaSystem.isLiveAgentAvailable()){
	 return 'You have reached your NeedIt search limit. I will transfer you to a live agent for assistance.'
	 } else {
	 return 'You have reached your NeedIt search limit. If you need to work with multiple NeedIt records, open NeedIt > My NeedIt Requests.'
	 }
	})()","mode":"script"}],"requestFeedback":true,"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"2fdc0de200a245dd977bab3c7901a472":{"id":"2fdc0de200a245dd977bab3c7901a472","name":"Transfer to Agent","script":"(function execute() {

	 vaSystem.connectToAgent();
	})()","stepType":"ScriptAction","applicability":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {

	 // otherwise, return false
	 if (vaSystem.isLiveAgentAvailable()){
	 return true;
	 } else {

execute() {
	 // If the value of search_count is less than 3, return true
	 // otherwise, return false
	 if (vaVars.search_count < 3)
	 return true;
	 else
	 return false;
	})()"},"label":"Less than 3"},{"id":"213af73719974b7fb27a3810429b543a","edgeType":"Branch","source":"b21876e2a8fd42f2988fe603e805f6f6","target":"2ea5387ea49444d3ba92f2166224b917","sourcePort":"","targetPort":"","expression":{"mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
	 // If the value of search_count is less than 3, return true
	 // otherwise, return false
	 if (vaVars.search_count < 3)
	 return false;
	 else
	 return true;
	})()"},"label":"3 or More"},{"id":"966a53b59b4d42fbac5083a78e0f7c53","edgeType":"Edge","source":"2ea5387ea49444d3ba92f2166224b917","target":"2fdc0de200a245dd977bab3c7901a472","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""},{"id":"c17f37df0d924a9a907df80c7f128d8a","edgeType":"Edge","source":"2fdc0de200a245dd977bab3c7901a472","target":"8f7d1c5b83f14f42a71403dda1fec177","sourcePort":"","targetPort":""}]}}}</graph><key_phrases>Update NeedIt Records2,NeedIt List Record Test,Update NeedIt Records,NeedIt Request</key_phrases><library>false</library><live_agent>false</live_agent><model_type>nlu_keyword</model_type><modify_confirmation_enabled>false</modify_confirmation_enabled><name>Update NeedIt Records2</name><nlu_intent/><nlu_intent_label/><nlu_model/><nlu_model_label/><nlu_provider/><palette_label/><roles/><root_topic_id>f976a57247ea0210db000b02d16d43a6</root_topic_id><secure_custom_input_control>false</secure_custom_input_control><source_topic_id>f976a57247ea0210db000b02d16d43a6</source_topic_id><sys_class_name>sys_cb_topic</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-11 04:02:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>30b5aa1447360210db000b02d16d430a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update NeedIt Records2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt Virtual Agent Conversations" source="x_726185_needit_vi">11fc1dfa476a0210db000b02d16d438b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt Virtual Agent Conversations">11fc1dfa476a0210db000b02d16d438b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_cb_topic_30b5aa1447360210db000b02d16d430a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-11 04:02:48</sys_updated_on><triggerable_by_notification>false</triggerable_by_notification><type>STANDARD</type></sys_cb_topic><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=30b5aa1447360210db000b02d16d430a"/></record_update>
